title: Chandrika Kundan Stud Earrings
materials: High-quality Kundan Stones. Features Hyderabadi craftsmanship with a meticulous attention to detail
ensuring a finish that is both durable and radiant.
features: These Chandrika earrings feature a classic floral arrangement with a triangle stone as the core. The clear Kundan stones are individually set in a traditional setting, creating a captivating effect of light. The setting is designed to maximize the stone's brilliance and provide a contemporary look.
colors: which showcases the rich gold color of the plating and clarity of the stones
highlighting the shine of each gem.
occasions: Ideal for everyday wear as well as for celebrations like Ugadi
or for adding a touch of ethnic charm to casual gatherings.
description: These stud earrings offer a timeless design that combines the beauty of Kundan with modern style. The intricate craftsmanship ensures these earrings will remain a cherished item in your jewelry collection.
